ActorTalk: [PlayerName]... things have been getting worse around here lately.
Looks like the boss got into a bit of trouble out there. Lately, we've been getting harassed by some really shady, menacing-looking folks.
I've been busy with customers, so I haven't really caught what they've been saying to him.
I just remember them throwing around words like "takeover," and they weren't exactly polite about it.
Yeah, I talked to Mr. Ross.
